BuildTime.description: The time it takes to build the sentry before the engineer can attack again

MaxUnits.description: The maximum number of units that can be spawned at once per tower (-1 = infinite)

SpawnTime.description: The time it takes for a unit to spawn

SentryShield.description: Should the sentry have a shield

Buildzone.description: The range around the tower that units can spawn in

Deadzone.description: The range around the tower that units cannot spawn in (or that the tower cannot attack in)
